name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Frontend Engineer with extensive expertise in **React**, **Next.js**, **JavaScript**, and **TypeScript**, excelling in crafting responsive and user-friendly UI components. Skilled in API integration and utilizing tools such as **Postman** for effective testing and debugging. Demonstrated passion for accessibility and usability, ensuring products meet the needs of diverse users. Adaptable and highly detail-oriented, with a strong autonomy to drive projects forward. Proven track record in healthcare, eCommerce, and finance sectors, focusing on enhancing user experiences through meticulous design and a commitment to clean, efficient code.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed responsive user interfaces utilizing **React** and **Next.js**, enhancing usability and accessibility across web applications.
Collaborated closely with backend teams to consume and integrate **APIs** using **JavaScript** and **TypeScript**, resulting in improved application performance and user experience.
Conducted rigorous debugging and cross-browser testing, achieving a 30% reduction in bug reports post-launch.
Implemented product thinking methodologies, prioritizing customer feedback in the design process, which resulted in a 25% increase in user satisfaction.
Maintained meticulous attention to detail in code reviews, ensuring adherence to design specifications and coding standards.
Exhibited curiosity and a commitment to continuous learning by staying updated with the latest trends in **front-end technologies** and frameworks.
Fostered autonomy in project management by leading initiatives to enhance development workflows, contributing to a 20% increase in team productivity.

Designed and developed responsive user interfaces using **React** and **Next.js**, improving overall user engagement by 30%.
Implemented robust APIs and integrated **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** to enhance functionality while ensuring a seamless user experience.
Conducted thorough testing using **Postman** and various debugging methodologies, leading to a **20% reduction** in reported issues post-launch.
Focused on accessibility and usability best practices, increasing the product's reach and satisfaction ratings by **15%**.
Engaged in product thinking and iterations, demonstrating autonomy and a high attention to detail, which contributed to the timely delivery of 5 major features over the last **6 months**.

Designed and developed responsive user interfaces using **React** and **Next.js**, ensuring seamless component integration with backend **APIs**.
Utilized **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** for robust frontend development, enhancing code quality and maintainability.
Conducted thorough debugging processes and usability testing, improving application accessibility by **25%**.
Implemented effective HTTP request management using **Postman**, achieving a streamlined development workflow.
Focused on attention to detail in UI design, which enhanced overall user experience and engagement metrics by **15%**.
Demonstrated autonomy in project management while meeting tight deadlines, successfully delivering **3** major feature updates per quarter.

skills:
Programming Languages: Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin

	Backend Frameworks: Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate, Node.js, Express.js, JPA, Kafka, RabbitMQ

	Frontend Frameworks: React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest, Responsive UI, Accessibility, Usability

	API Technologies: APIs, HTTP, Postman, RESTful API design

	Serverless and Cloud Functions: AWS Lambda, API Gateway

	Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB

	DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline

	Cloud & Infrastructure: AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3), CloudWatch, ELK Stack, Infrastructure as Code (IaC)

	Other: Microservices, CI/CD, Data structures and algorithms, Agile/Scrum methodologies, Debugging, Product Thinking, Attention to Detail, Curiosity, Autonomy
